channel.title: Changing what items kept at death?
channel.description: how do you change what items are kept at death, and i keep changing the color of an item but won't change it in game i might be doing somthing wrong but i doubt it is there items that can't be changed?

item.title: Changing what items kept at death?
item.dc:creator: @skarletdeath skarletdeath
item.description:
@skarletdeath wrote:

alright thanks guys them where only things I needed help on besides getting new prayers to work and the stupid master fishing drops fish on ground thats prolly easy though just don’t know what i’m doin with it.

Read full topic
item.source: Changing what items kept at death?

item.title: Changing what items kept at death?
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

The items kept on death are the most valuable items you are carrying, just rise the price of the item from serverside ItemDef.

Read full topic
item.source: Changing what items kept at death?

item.title: Changing what items kept at death?
item.dc:creator: @IlikeArrays IlikeArrays
item.description:
@IlikeArrays wrote:

Item coloring … client sided if the picture is gray default.

Changing items on death… look at how deaths are handled?
